org.search.engine.filesystem

Interface FilesystemNotifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FilesystemNotificationManager

    public interface FilesystemNotifier
    API interface which allow to register file or folder on track changes and be notified about entity changes. This API helps to quick switch implementations. Currently system use FilesystemNotificationManager implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(FilesystemEventListener listener)
      Register listener to be notified of changes within registered folders or files

    • Method Detail

      • registerFile

        boolean registerFile(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
        Method register certain file to be tracked in the system
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file which want to be tracked
        Returns:
        identify if the file was registered in the notifier

      • registerFolder

        boolean registerFolder(java.nio.file.Path folderPath)
        Method register certain folder to be tracked in the system
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The path to the registered folder
        Returns:
        identify if the folder was registered in the notifier

      • unregisterFile

        boolean unregisterFile(java.nio.file.Path filePath)
        Method unregister file from the been tracked by notification service
        Parameters:
        filePath - The path to the file which should be unregistered
        Returns:
        identify if the file was successfully unregistered

      • unregisterFolder

        boolean unregisterFolder(java.nio.file.Path folderPath)
        Method unregister folder from the been tracked by notification service
        Parameters:
        folderPath - The path to the folder which should be unregistered
        Returns:
        identify if the folder was successfully unregistered

      • addListener

        void addListener(FilesystemEventListener listener)
        Register listener to be notified of changes within registered folders or files
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener which should be notified about changes. It should implement interface FilesystemEventListener

      • removeListener

        boolean removeListener(FilesystemEventListener listener)
        Unregister listener from been notified
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener which should be removed from notifiers.
        Returns:
        identifier about successful removals
